pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantile-Based Clustering Algorithms // Various quantile-based clustering algorithms: algorithm CU (Common theta and Unscaled variables), algorithm CS (Common theta and Scaled variables through lambda_j), algorithm VU (Variable-wise theta_j and Unscaled variables) and algorithm VW (Variable-wise theta_j and Scaled variables through lambda_j). Hennig, Viroli, Anderlucci (2018) arXiv:1806.10403v1.
